update-download-protocol.help: Set up download protocol for update firmware

disable-certificate-enrollment.help: Enables or disables certificate enrollment feature

application-header-address.help: Address to the application header information in flash. By default the value is inherited from target config

cfg-sector-1-address.help: Flash sector address for SOTP sector 1. By default the value is inherited from target config.

cfg-sector-1-size.help: Flash sector size for SOTP sector 1. By default the value is inherited from target config.

cfg-sector-2-address.help: Flash sector address for SOTP sector 2. By default the value is inherited from target config.

cfg-sector-2-size.help: Flash sector size for SOTP sector 2. By default the value is inherited from target config.

cfg-num-sectors.help: Number of SOTP sectors. By default the value is inherited from target config.

storage-address.help: The starting address for the firmware storage when using block device (SD, QSPIF, SPIF, FlashIAP). By default the value is inherited from bootloader config. You will have to override this if you're not using bootlaoder.

storage-size.help: Total storage allocated for firmware image(s). By default the value is inherited from bootloader config. You will have to override this if you're not using bootlaoder.

storage-locations.help: Number of equally sized locations the storage space should be split into. By default the value is inherited from bootloader config. You will have to override this if you're not using bootlaoder.
